Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier fire department activity.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 GarfieldTemporary Reroute at 55th/Hamlin
